backlog.description: Validate survey weights and replicate design
Exploratory weighted summaries for key outcomes
Profile missingness patterns for key variables
Draft robustness checks for priority hypotheses
Assess feasibility of social support predictor given 97% missingness
Draft confirmatory model equations/code skeleton for PAP freeze
Verify instrument equivalence for social support items (tmt46e6 vs 71mn55g)
Freeze PAP and tag reproducibility checkpoint
Plan FDR procedure and robustness execution scripts
Execute confirmatory HC3 OLS per frozen PAP
Apply Benjamini-Hochberg FDR for confirmatory hypotheses
Execute pre-specified robustness checks for HYP-001 and HYP-003
Draft confirmatory findings and update manuscript parity

next_actions.description: Apply Benjamini-Hochberg FDR for confirmatory hypotheses
Execute pre-specified robustness checks for HYP-001 and HYP-003

notes: PAP frozen (HYP-001, HYP-003); FDR and robustness automation implemented per T-011.
